question.title: Customer Placing the Largest Number of Orders
hints: MySQL uses a different expression to get the first records other than MSSQL's TOP expression.
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists orders (order_number int, customer_number int, order_date date, required_date date, shipped_date date, status char(15), comment char(200), key(order_number))
